text: All the Israelites did exactly as the LORD had commanded Moses and Aaron.
These, upon learning that Jonathan had been captured and killed along with his companions, encouraged one another and went out in close formation, ready to fight.
For whoever does the will of my heavenly Father is my brother, and sister, and mother.”
There is a baptism with which I must be baptized, and how great is my anguish until it is accomplished!
And I know that his commandment is eternal life. So what I say, I say as the Father told me.”
